memberdef.name: DEFUN_DLD

param.type:
"-*- texinfo -*-
\@deftypefn {Loadable Function} {@var{version} =} sfversion ()
\@cindex Reading sound files
\Return a string containing the libsndfile version.
\@seealso{sfread, sfwrite}
\@end deftypefn"

memberdef.name: DEFUN_DLD

param.type:
"-*- texinfo -*-
\@deftypefn {Loadable Function} {@var{data},@var{srate},@var{format} =} sfread (@var{filename})
\@cindex Reading sound files
\Read a sound file from disk using libsndfile.
\@seealso{sfversion, sfwrite}
\@end deftypefn"

memberdef.name: DEFUN_DLD

param.type:
"-*- texinfo -*-
\@deftypefn {Function File} sfwrite (@var{filename},@var{data},@var{srate},@var{format})
\Write a sound file to disk using libsndfile.
\@seealso{sfread, sfversion}
\@end deftypefn
"
